good-code_key3:
snake_case:
We used this case on giving the `variable` name  writing the `code`.
good-code_key4:
camelCase
On writing the `code` on we define function than we use this case.
good-code_key5:
CAPSCASE
To define the name of the constants
good-code_key6:
for Booleans
Names like
  - isValid
  - ifworking
good-code_key7: ### `Code` runs in one or two times
good-code_key8: Agar aapko `code` chalane mei bahut saari attempts karni pad rahi hai, iska matlab aap `code` ke saath struggle kar rahe hai.
good-code_key10: Apne `code` ko acche se document karna bahut jaroori hai. Agar aapka `code` properly documented nahi hai toh, isse aapko kaafi problems aayengi. Interviews ke time par bhi yeh ek bahut important habit hai. Mentors should reject `code` which isn't properly documented.
good-code_key12: Jo bhi aap `code` likh rahe hai, woh repeat nahi karna chahiye.
